experiences.title: Half Day Deep Sea Fishing Adventure
experiences.description: Target mahi-mahi, sailfish, and kingfish on our 38-foot custom sportfisher. Our USCG-licensed captain has 20+ years experience fishing the Gulf Stream. All gear, bait, and licenses included.

experiences.title: Full Day Offshore Fishing Expedition
experiences.description: Go after the big ones! Full day offshore targeting marlin, tuna, and wahoo. Venture 20-40 miles offshore into prime fishing grounds. Includes lunch and beverages.

experiences.title: Islamorada Backcountry Flats Fishing
experiences.description: Fish the shallow flats for bonefish, tarpon, and permit with our expert fly fishing guide. Perfect for beginners and experienced anglers. Poling through crystal-clear waters in search of trophy fish.

location.address: Bud N' Mary's Marina, 79851 Overseas Hwy

experiences.title: Miami Sunset Cruise on Biscayne Bay
experiences.description: Experience Miami's stunning skyline as the sun sets over Biscayne Bay. Cruise past Star Island, Fisher Island, and the Venetian Islands. Complimentary champagne and light appetizers included.

experiences.title: Celebrity Homes & Millionaire's Row Cruise
experiences.description: See how Miami's rich and famous live! Cruise past the waterfront mansions of celebrities, athletes, and business moguls on Star Island, Hibiscus Island, and Palm Island.

experiences.title: Key West Snorkeling Adventure
experiences.description: Explore America's only living coral reef! Snorkel two pristine locations in the Florida Keys National Marine Sanctuary. Spot tropical fish, sea turtles, and vibrant coral formations.

experiences.title: Fort Lauderdale Party Boat Cruise
experiences.description: The ultimate party on the water! DJ spinning hits, open bar, and dancing under the stars. Cruise the Intracoastal Waterway and see Fort Lauderdale's yachts and mansions.

experiences.title: Jet Ski Tour of Miami Coastline
experiences.description: Ride your own jet ski along Miami's stunning coastline! Cruise past South Beach, see celebrity homes, and feel the thrill of riding across Biscayne Bay. No experience necessary.
requirements: Minimum age 18 to drive (16 with guardian)

experiences.title: Parasailing Over South Beach
experiences.description: Soar 300 feet above Miami Beach for breathtaking aerial views of the Atlantic Ocean, South Beach, and the Miami skyline. Safe, thrilling, and unforgettable!

location.address: South Pointe Park Marina, 1 Washington Ave

experiences.title: Destin Kayak Dolphin Encounter
experiences.description: Paddle through Destin's calm waters and get up close with wild dolphins! This guided kayak tour takes you to prime dolphin habitat in Choctawhatchee Bay.

experiences.title: Everglades Airboat Safari
experiences.description: Blast through the sawgrass marshes at 40 mph! See wild alligators, wading birds, and the unique Everglades ecosystem. Includes live alligator show and wildlife presentation.

experiences.title: Private Everglades Night Airboat Tour
experiences.description: Experience the Everglades after dark! Spot nocturnal wildlife including alligators, raccoons, and owls. Our spotlight reveals eyes glowing in the darkness - an unforgettable adventure.

experiences.title: Crystal River Manatee Snorkel Tour
experiences.description: Swim with gentle giants! Crystal River is the only place in North America where you can legally swim with wild manatees. Our expert guides ensure respectful wildlife encounters.

location.address: Manatee Tour & Dive, 925 N Citrus Ave

experiences.title: Key Largo Mangrove Kayak Eco-Tour
experiences.description: Explore the unique mangrove ecosystem of the Florida Keys. Paddle through tunnels of mangrove trees, spot juvenile fish, birds, and learn about this vital habitat from our naturalist guide.

location.address: John Pennekamp State Park, 102601 Overseas Hwy

experiences.title: Tampa Bay Dolphin Watch Eco-Cruise
experiences.description: Cruise Tampa Bay's productive waters in search of bottlenose dolphins. Our marine biologist shares insights about dolphin behavior, local ecology, and conservation efforts.

experiences.title: Little Havana Cuban Food & Culture Tour
experiences.description: Taste authentic Cuban cuisine while exploring Miami's Little Havana! Visit family-owned restaurants, watch cigars being hand-rolled, sip café Cubano, and learn about Cuban-American culture.

location.address: Máximo Gómez Park (Domino Park), 1444 SW 8th St

experiences.title: Wynwood Arts District Food & Street Art Walk
experiences.description: Explore Miami's hippest neighborhood! Admire world-famous street art murals while tasting creative cuisine from food trucks, craft breweries, and innovative restaurants in Wynwood.

experiences.title: Key West Sunset & Seafood Culinary Experience
experiences.description: Taste Key West's freshest seafood at sunset! Visit 4 waterfront restaurants for conch fritters, key lime pie, fresh catch, and rum cocktails while watching the famous Key West sunset.

experiences.title: St. Augustine Historic Walking Tour
experiences.description: Walk through 450 years of history in America's oldest city! Explore the Castillo de San Marcos, Spanish Quarter, and historic landmarks with our expert historian guide.

experiences.title: St. Augustine Ghost & Legends Night Tour
experiences.description: Explore St. Augustine's haunted history after dark! Visit spooky locations, hear ghost stories, and learn about the city's darker past. This tour has been featured on national TV!

location.address: Castillo de San Marcos, 1 S Castillo Dr

experiences.title: Miami Art Deco District Walking Tour
experiences.description: Discover Miami Beach's iconic Art Deco architecture! Explore the world's largest collection of Art Deco buildings on Ocean Drive. Learn about the 1930s design movement and preservation efforts.

location.address: Art Deco Welcome Center, 1001 Ocean Dr

experiences.title: Zip-Line Adventure Through Florida Treetops
experiences.description: Soar through the forest canopy on 7 zip-lines ranging from 200 to 750 feet! Experience speeds up to 35 mph and heights up to 65 feet. Professional guides ensure your safety and fun.

location.address: Forever Florida Wilderness, 4755 N Kenansville Rd

experiences.title: Skydiving Over the Florida Keys
experiences.description: Experience the ultimate adrenaline rush! Tandem skydive from 10,000 feet with breathtaking views of the turquoise waters and coral reefs. Video packages available.

location.address: Key West International Airport, 3491 S Roosevelt Blvd

experiences.title: Orlando Theme Parks Hop-On Hop-Off Tour
experiences.description: Visit multiple Orlando theme parks with ease! Our shuttle service connects Universal Studios, Islands of Adventure, Disney Springs, and International Drive attractions. Skip the parking hassle!

experiences.title: Florida Keys Island Hopping Multi-Day Tour
experiences.description: 3-day guided tour from Miami to Key West! Visit Key Largo, Islamorada, Marathon, and Key West. Includes accommodations, some meals, snorkeling, and all transportation.

experiences.title: Islamorada Sunset Tarpon Fishing
experiences.description: Target the 'silver king' during golden hour! Tarpon fishing at sunset is an Islamorada tradition. Watch these massive fish roll and jump as the sky turns orange and pink.

experiences.title: Tampa Bay Craft Brewery Bus Tour
experiences.description: Sample Tampa's best craft beers! Visit 4 award-winning breweries, meet the brewmasters, enjoy beer tastings, and learn about the brewing process. Designated driver included!

experiences.title: Stand-Up Paddleboard Yoga at Sunrise
experiences.description: Find your zen on the water! Start your day with SUP yoga on calm Destin waters. Perfect for all levels - our certified instructors adapt poses to your experience level.

experiences.title: Naples Sunset Dolphin & Shelling Cruise
experiences.description: Explore Naples' pristine coastline as the sun sets! Search for dolphins, collect shells on secluded beaches, and watch for sea turtles. Complimentary wine and appetizers served.

experiences.title: Private Luxury Yacht Charter - Biscayne Bay
experiences.description: Experience Miami in style aboard our 55-foot luxury yacht. Cruise Biscayne Bay, anchor at exclusive islands, enjoy gourmet catering, and receive VIP treatment from our professional crew.

experiences.title: Crystal River Manatee Kayak Tour
experiences.description: Paddle alongside manatees in their natural habitat! Crystal-clear springs provide perfect viewing. More intimate than snorkeling - observe these gentle giants from your kayak.

location.address: Three Sisters Springs, 123 NW US Hwy 19

experiences.title: Fort Myers Beach Parasailing & Jet Ski Combo
experiences.description: Best of both worlds! Soar 400 feet above Fort Myers Beach on our parasail, then zoom across the Gulf on a jet ski. Perfect combo for thrill-seekers!

experiences.title: Miami Vice & Narcos TV Locations Tour
experiences.description: See Miami through the lens of TV history! Visit filming locations from Miami Vice, Narcos, Dexter, and more. Hear behind-the-scenes stories and see how Miami shaped these iconic shows.

experiences.title: Sanibel Island Shelling & Lighthouse Tour
experiences.description: Shell seeker's paradise! Sanibel is world-famous for shelling. Explore pristine beaches, learn shell identification, visit the historic lighthouse, and find your treasures.

experiences.title: Key West Hemingway House & Bar Hopping Tour
experiences.description: Follow in Papa's footsteps! Visit Hemingway's home and studio, meet the six-toed cats, then bar hop to his favorite watering holes. Literary history meets island nightlife!

experiences.title: Orlando Helicopter Tour - Theme Parks & Downtown
experiences.description: See Orlando from the sky! Fly over Disney World, Universal Studios, SeaWorld, and downtown Orlando. Unforgettable bird's-eye views of Central Florida's top attractions.

experiences.title: Everglades Photography Safari at Sunset
experiences.description: Perfect for photographers! Smaller groups, slower speeds, and sunset golden hour lighting. Capture alligators, birds, and stunning Everglades landscapes with expert photo guidance.

experiences.title: Clearwater Beach Sunset Catamaran Cruise
experiences.description: Sail into the sunset on our spacious catamaran! Enjoy complimentary champagne, watch dolphins play, and witness Clearwater's famous sunset. Perfect for couples and small groups.

experiences.title: Jacksonville River Taxi Historic Tour
experiences.description: Explore Jacksonville's waterfront history! This narrated water taxi tour covers the St. Johns River, downtown skyline, and historic neighborhoods. Hop off at any stop to explore.

experiences.title: Pensacola Beach Snorkel & Dive Shipwreck Tour
experiences.description: Explore the artificial reef! Dive or snorkel historic shipwrecks intentionally sunk to create marine habitat. See tropical fish, sea turtles, and even reef sharks!

location.address: Pensacola Beach Marina, 715 Pensacola Beach Blvd

experiences.title: Marco Island Kayak Mangrove Tunnel Tour
experiences.description: Paddle through magical mangrove tunnels! Navigate winding water trails through ancient mangrove forests. Spot dolphins, manatees, sea turtles, and countless birds.

experiences.title: Miami Brickell Food Crawl & Rooftop Bars
experiences.description: Explore Miami's modern downtown! Visit 4 Brickell hotspots for international cuisine and craft cocktails. End at a rooftop bar with stunning skyline views.

location.address: Brickell City Centre, 701 S Miami Ave

experiences.title: Miami Millionaire's Row & Stiltsville Cruise
experiences.description: See Miami's most exclusive real estate and the mysterious Stiltsville houses! Cruise past celebrity mansions, then visit the historic houses on stilts in Biscayne Bay.

experiences.title: Ocala Canopy Zip-Line & Rope Challenge Course
experiences.description: Ultimate treetop adventure! Combine 7 zip-lines with a challenging rope course featuring 65+ obstacles. Team-building perfection or solo challenge - you choose!

location.address: Forever Florida Wilderness, 4755 N Kenansville Rd

experiences.title: Orlando to Kennedy Space Center Day Trip
experiences.description: Explore NASA's launch headquarters! Round-trip bus from Orlando with admission to Kennedy Space Center. See rockets, meet astronauts, tour launch pads, and experience space history.

experiences.title: Miami Beach Flyboarding Experience
experiences.description: Fly like Iron Man! Jet-powered water boots propel you 30 feet in the air. Our instructors get you flying in minutes. Unforgettable rush!

location.address: South Pointe Park Marina, 1 Washington Ave

experiences.title: St. Augustine Scenic Train & Trolley Tour
experiences.description: Explore St. Augustine in style! Hop aboard our historic-style trolley for a narrated tour of 20+ landmarks. Hop-on hop-off at your leisure to explore museums and attractions.

experiences.title: Key West Glass Bottom Boat Coral Reef Tour
experiences.description: See the reef without getting wet! Our glass bottom boat provides perfect viewing of North America's only living coral reef. Perfect for non-swimmers and all ages.

experiences.title: Daytona Beach Motorsports Experience & Tour
experiences.description: Visit the 'World Center of Racing'! Tour Daytona International Speedway, walk the pit road, visit Victory Lane, and learn NASCAR history. Upgrade to ride along in a race car!

location.address: Daytona International Speedway, 1801 W International Speedway Blvd

experiences.title: Tampa Bay Sunset Kayak & Bioluminescence Tour
experiences.description: Magical evening paddle! Watch the sunset then experience glowing bioluminescent waters. Every paddle stroke creates sparkles - like kayaking through stars! Summer months only.

location.address: Fort De Soto Park, 3500 Pinellas Bayway S
